General.Name: YBS International Bhd
General.Description: YBS International Berhad, an investment holding company, primarily engages in the provision of management services. It operates in three segments, Precision Engineering and Plastic Injection Moulding, Precision Machining and Stamping, and Paper Products. The Precision Engineering and Plastic Injection Moulding segment offers high precision moulds, tools, and dies; jigs and fixtures; and plastic injection moulding and sub-assembly products. The Precision Machining and Stamping segment provides precision machining components, metal and paper stamping components, and electronics devices and equipment with metal and plastic parts for the telecommunication, industrial sensors, switches, electronic equipment, and other industries, as well as related specialized engineering services. The Paper Products segment offers corrugated and honeycomb boards, and paper products used in packaging and shipping, furniture and fittings, and point of purchase display and exhibition fields. The company is also involved in the manufacture and assembly of electronic components; property letting; research, experimental development, and trading of engineering parts; and manufacture of precise mechanical components and labels for electricity, electric, information, and other industries, as well as design, development, and supply of interconnect solutions. It serves the connector, automotive, office and home appliances, electrical and electronics, computer and peripherals, telecommunication, IT and communication, and aerospace and defence markets in Europe, Malaysia, Vietnam, the United States, and internationally. The company was formerly known as LNG Resources Berhad and changed its name to YBS International Berhad in September 2018. YBS International Berhad was incorporated in 2002 and is headquartered in Muar, Malaysia.
